subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project fits within an overall framework of the proposed support to the Government of Jordan in the area of poverty reduction elaborated in the annexed aide memoire (annex1). The focus of this project is on Data and Knowledge Production to support poverty reduction policy-making. The project will provide the needed technical support to develop the capacity of the Department of Statistics and the Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation in production of poverty data using multi-dimensional definitions, setting related poverty lines, poverty analysis,  and monitoring, each within their role.
subproject.title: Support to Poverty Analysis

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project fits within an overall framework of the proposed support to the Government of Jordan in the area of poverty reduction elaborated in the annexed aide memoire (annex1). The focus of this project is on Data and Knowledge Production to support poverty reduction policy-making. The project will provide the needed technical support to develop the capacity of the Department of Statistics and the Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation in production of poverty data using multi-dimensional definitions, setting related poverty lines, poverty analysis,  and monitoring, each within their role.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The main objectives of this project are to assist the Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation, the Department of Statistics, and their social sector partners to develop the definitions, the measurement and information tools, the analytical and technical capacity, and the coordination mechanisms that will be needed to respond to the challenges of the next decade created by the rising “social risks” of vulnerability and exclusion that are likely to confront the Kingdom. Phase II initiatives are designed to provide direct support to the National Agenda 2006 – 2015 poverty alleviation initiatives 2, 3, 4 and 6 as follows: 2. Develop a comprehensive national social policy with a focus on social development and productivity enhancement; 3. Strengthen human resource capacities to implement poverty alleviation programs; 4. Develop a clear understanding of poverty root causes and characteristics; 6. Provide assistance to the unemployed poor to integrate into the workforce.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support Poverty Analysis II

title: Support to Poverty Analysis and Monitoring
